summary: This document details an investigation conducted by the FBI regarding inmate records for Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Kessler. It notes that both inmates were never housed in the same Bureau of Prisons facilities during their incarceration periods, as confirmed by a paralegal from the Consolidated Legal Center.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Alfredo Rodriguez is mentioned as the agent who drafted the electronic communication regarding the investigation.

persons.name: Steven Hoffenberg
persons.context: Steven Hoffenberg is referenced as an inmate whose Bureau of Prisons records were provided for the investigation.

persons.name: Berry Kessler
persons.context: Berry Kessler is mentioned as another inmate whose records were reviewed, confirming he was not housed with Hoffenberg.

connections.description: Both are inmates whose records were reviewed, but they were never housed together.

events.title: Investigation of Inmate Records
events.description: An investigation was conducted regarding the housing records of inmates Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Kessler.

keyFacts: The investigation was conducted by Special Agent Alfredo Rodriguez.
BOP records for inmates Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Kessler were provided.
Kessler and Hoffenberg were never housed in the same BOP facilities during their incarceration.
